content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Better to Give You hit yourself instead of the target. Melee
Weapon Problem If the attack used a projectile weapon, something on the weapon malfunctions, requiring you to spend 2 Interact actions to fix. Ranged
Sneeze You are slowed 1 until the end of your next turn. Unarmed
Spell Rush You are stupefied 1 until healed. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #37
